shortDesc: Noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with long battery life
detailsDesc: Enjoy immersive audio with advanced noise-cancellation technology. Comfortable over-ear design, 40-hour battery life, and Bluetooth 5.0 for stable connectivity.

shortDesc: Track your heart rate, steps, and sleep with ease
detailsDesc: Waterproof fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, GPS tracking, sleep analysis, and 7-day battery. Syncs seamlessly with Android and iOS.
Durable and stylish backpack with padded laptop sleeve, multiple compartments, anti-theft pocket, and water-resistant exterior. Ideal for work or travel.

shortDesc: Touch control LED lamp with adjustable brightness
detailsDesc: Minimalist LED desk lamp with 3 brightness levels, touch-sensitive controls, USB charging port, and foldable arm. Energy-efficient and eye-caring.
